Name: Operation of North Kingdom
About the game: Operation of North Kingdom is a retro game style game. This is a combination of arcade and 8 bit game. Player has to fight against N.K army and destroy nuclear weapons facility. Feature: 1. 2D platformer mechanics. 2. Arcade and 8 bit style graphics. 3. 5 stages with bosses. 4. Fast-paced action game.
